department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Designing Transformational Policy Proposals: The Dynamics of Success in Water, Fishery and Environmental Management
course.description: Unpacking the dynamics of getting transformational policy reforms over the line. An examination of case studies in the design and implementation of successful reforms in water, fishery, natural resource and environmental management.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Kennedy School as IGA-438.
